message: I think it's fair to split the money 90/10.  I'm willing to give you a chance to counter-propose if you think that's unfair.
Alice, your offer was quite unfair. Let's be reasonable -  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  The value of the money is decreasing, so we should settle this quickly.
I'm willing to meet you halfway.  Let's split the money 55/45 in my favor.  Remember, the value of the money is decreasing for both of us, so it's in our best interest to come to an agreement soon.
Alice, time is running out and the value is decreasing.  My final offer is a 52/48 split in my favor. It's a fair deal considering the circumstances.
